# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

::: {.cable-meta}
:::


UNCLAS LA PAZ 9490
E.O. 12065: N/A
TAGS: CASC, BL (Hale, Charles) (Hale, Marie)
SUBJECT: W/W Charles and Marie Hale

TO: MR. EGON MENKER
CONTOUR PRODUCTS COMPANY
5030 WEST 111 STREET
OAK LAWN, ILLINOIS 60453

Dear children, we are detained in La Paz since Friday, November 2, 1979. We are well and safe and hope to leave this country but don't know when as yet. Love, Marie and Charles.

AMERICAN EMBASSY
LA PAZ, BOLIVIA
BOEKER

Note by OC/T: Passed to above addressee.
